participant_1.background:
I have a lot of friends who love to cook and eat, so I love to share my coupon finds with them!
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
i am the youngest of 4 children.
i wait tables at a cafe.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
i don t consume caffeine.
I'm not the most graceful person, but I'm trying to learn krav maga to improve my coordination.
I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.
I have no children, but I do enjoy a refreshing Coke while I'm relocating my troops.

content.text: Hello!  I'm Sarah. I'm a big fan of cooking, reading, and spending time with my friends and family.
Hi Sarah! I'm Jake. Nice to meet you. I'm interested in overcoming my fears and living a more fulfilling life.
That's great! I think it's really important to face your fears head on.
I agree. I'm working on it!
I'm afraid of a lot of things, but mostly heights and public speaking.
I can understand that. Heights can be scary! What about public speaking?
I just get really nervous and I worry about messing up.
I know what you mean. I used to be really nervous about public speaking too. But then I took a class on it and it helped a lot.
That's good to know. Maybe I should take a class too.
I would definitely recommend it! It helped me a lot.
Thanks for the advice! I'll look into it.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
